title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Export Zip feature takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.
OB: Currently, when updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) and there is no indication that the process is ongoing.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table, it should display a busy cursor to indicate that the process is ongoing.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Modify the checked state of the table.
3. Observe that a busy cursor is displayed during the update process.
